name: OR_IMP_PREVSTAT
description: The OR_IMP_PREVSTAT table contains OR management system implant status information.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the status information for the implant.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value indicating the previous status of the implant.
